Comments_List: I learned about the physics and kinematics of speech production, the differences between audio (acoustic) and articulatory phonetics, how acoustics and articulation interact with each other, and much much more. I also learned how to use Matlab and R.
Yes! If you want to know the backbone of P-side linguistics, this is the course to take!
